channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trust has become the crisis CEOs can’t ignore at Davos, as new data show 70% of people turning more ‘insular’
item.description: Trust guru Richard Edelman worries that time is running out for leaders to rebuild trust.

item.title: The 9 most disruptive deals of Trump’s first year back in the White House
item.description: President Trump's unorthodox dealmaking style has left the business community scrambling to adapt.

item.title: Selling America is a ‘dangerous bet,’ UBS CEO warns as markets panic
item.description: Gold is surging, and the dollar is sliding—but UBS’s CEO says the real risk is betting against the U.S.

item.title: Satya Nadella’s biggest AI bubble warning yet is a challenge to the Fortune 500: It’s time to reinvent the knowledge worker
item.description: The Microsoft CEO offers a fix to the AI productivity dilemma, calling on business leaders to shift workflows to match the structural design of the te...

item.title: History says there’s a 90% chance that Trump’s party will lose seats in the midterm elections. It also says there’s a 100% chance
item.description: Since 1946, there have been 20 midterm elections. In 18 of them, the president’s party lost seats in the House of Representatives.

item.title: Trade war redux? Greenland dispute threatens $1T in trade between U.S., Europe.
